results.title: Syncope and sinus bradycardia from combined use of thalidomide and beta-blocker.
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Thalidomide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013792 @@@Thalidomide@@@ therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Multiple_Myeloma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009101 @@@MM@@@ was added to longstanding @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ therapy one month prior to presentation.
